name: OIL FILLING
description:
It is a game to charge and manage oil.
Dodge the zombies and refill your oil. When the gas station's oil level is 0%, you are in danger!

How to play: Move with the WASD keys to avoid zombies and press F to refill oil at gas stations.

Currently there are levels 1-4.
We will expand levels and add maps in future updates.
